exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a, b : R n : nat Unable to unify "if Rle_dec a b then cons (Sup_fct f (a + 0 * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) (a + 1 * (b - a) / (INR n + 1))) (seq2Rlist (pairmap (fun x y : R => Sup_fct f x y) (a + 1 * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) [seq a + INR i * (b - a) / (INR n + 1) | i <- seq.iota 2 n])) else cons (Sup_fct f (b + 0 * (a - b) / (INR n + 1)) (b + 1 * (a - b) / (INR n + 1))) (seq2Rlist (pairmap (fun x y : R => Sup_fct f x y) (b + 1 * (a - b) / (INR n + 1)) [seq b + INR i * (a - b) / (INR n + 1) | i <- seq.iota 2 n]))" with "subdivision_val (SF_sup_r f a b n)".

In environment H : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (x : T1) (s : seq T1), f x :: [seq f i | i <- s] = f x :: [seq f i | i <- s] f : R -> R a, b : R n : nat r : a <= b Heqs : Rle_dec a b = left r Unable to unify "[seq x | x <- ?M3062] = ?M3062" with "subdivision_val (SF_sup_r f a b n) = cons (Sup_fct f (a + 0 * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) (a + 1 * (b - a) / (INR n + 1))) (seq2Rlist (pairmap (fun x y : R => Sup_fct f x y) (a + 1 * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) [seq a + INR i * (b - a) / (INR n + 1) | i <- seq.iota 2 n]))".

original: unfold SF_map. unfold SF_cons. simpl. f_equal. - reflexivity. - rewrite map_cons. f_equal. apply map_id.
